Summary: Acsending stream of red lights - maybe 20 or more - not aircraft - not fireworks
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Cromwell
There were no other sightings in Cromwell on or around July 3rd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsAcsending stream of red lights - maybe 20 or more - not aircraft - not fireworks. Riding scooter home in Cromwell headed west on high hill. I saw red lights on the horizon due south ascending in an arc as if each was following the other. They ascended and then disapeared slowly. They could have been coast gaurd flares sent from long island sound (guess). Another observer stopped and watched too. The whole thing lasted about 2 minutes.
